mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, BOARD_SORT, BOARD_DEPTH, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_ID, BOARD_DEL_FLG FROM tb_board WHERE BOARD_DEL_FLG = 'N' ORDER BY group_seq DESC, board_sort ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select BOARD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, BOARD_SORT, BOARD_DEPTH, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_ID, BOARD_DEL_FLG FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{value} AND BOARD_DEL_FLG = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FLG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD(BOARD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_ID) VALUES(NEXTVAL(board_seq), LASTVAL(board_seq), LASTVAL(board_seq), #{userId}, #{title},#{content}, #{registDate}, #{userId}, #{modifyDate},#{userId})

INSERT INTO TB_BOARD(BOARD_SEQ, PARENT_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, BOARD_SORT, BOARD_DEPTH, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REGIST_ID, MODIFY_ID) VALUES(NEXTVAL(BOARD_SEQ), #{boardSeq}, #{groupSeq}, (SELECT BOARD_SORT +1 FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}), (SELECT BOARD_DEPTH+1 FROM TB_BOARD B WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}), #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{userId})
